text: Aur inn ko woh din yaad dulaiye jiss mein Allah inn ko (apney huzoor) jama keray ga (to inn ko aisa mehsoos hoga) kay goya woh (duniya mein) saray din ki aik aadh ghari rahey hongay aur aapas mein aik doosray ko pehchanney ko thehray hon. Waqaee khasaray mein paray woh log jinhon ney Allah kay pass janey ko jhutlaya aur woh hudayat paney walay na thay
